text: Notocacteae are a tribe of cactus belonging to the Cactoideae subfamily. Scientific name: Notocacteae Rank: Tribe Higher Classification: Cactoideae == Genera == *Austrocactus *Blossfeldia *Cintia *Copiapoa (synonymous: Pilocopiapoa) *Eriosyce (synonymous: Chilenia, Chileniopsis, Horridocactus, Islaya, Neochilenia, Neoporteria, Pyrrhocactus, Reicheocactus, Rodentiophila, Thelocephala) *Eulychnia (synonymous: Philippicereus) *Frailea *Neowerdermannia *Parodia (synonymous: Brasilicactus, Brasiliparodia Echinocactus subg. Notocactus, Eriocactus, Notocactus, Wigginsia) Category:Cactoideae Category:Caryophyllales tribes
title: Notocacteae
